summary: A Chicago cop quits the force and finds himself threatened by the Mafia.
cast: Scott Wiper|Jack Conley|Carmen Argenziano|Richard Haje|Mo Gallini|Rolando Molina|Kirk McKinney|Jefferson Moore|Wayne Duvall|Mirjana Jokovic|Conner Greene|Lou Diamond Phillips|Benjamin John Parrillo|London King|Jon Farris|John Robert Thompson|Jim Conrad|Natasha Henstridge|Joe Pantoliano|Andre Braugher|B'nard Lewis|Zachary Mott|Rick Hoffman|Bernard Canepari|Dan Buran|Richard Hagerman|Morgan Lund|John Basinger|Jeanine Basinger|Joe Romeo|Gary Demastry|David Peck|Andy Robberts|Jeff Dixon|Brett Blake|Ray Crawford|Jeff Yesko|Todd Emmett|Richard Fike|John Kloock|Robert E. title: Entre dos fuegos
